sourcesContent:
import { Component, inject, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Course } from 'src/app/Models/course'; import { CourseService } from 'src/app/Services/course.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-course-detail', templateUrl: './course-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./course-detail.component.css'] }) export class CourseDetailComponent implements OnInit{ selectedCourse: Course; courseId: number; courseService: CourseService = inject(CourseService); activeRoute: ActivatedRoute = inject(ActivatedRoute); ngOnInit(): void { this.courseId = this.activeRoute.snapshot.params['id']; } }

Complete Modern JavaScript Course

Course Rating: 4.5
Duration: 18.5
Author: Steve Smith
